rates.description: Federal Goods and Services Tax (TPS in French)
rates.notes: Federal portion, collected by Revenu Québec on behalf of CRA
QST is calculated on the subtotal PLUS GST (compounded). Effective rate: 9.975% of (subtotal + GST) = 10.47375% of subtotal. Combined with GST, total is 14.975%.

notes: Quebec uses a unique compounded tax system. QST is calculated on the price including GST, making the effective combined rate 14.975% (not 14.975%). Revenu Québec administers both GST and QST in Quebec.
